title: Business Innovation and Investment (Provisional) visa
summary: This page provides information about the Business Innovation and Investment (Provisional) visa, Subclass 188. It explains that the visa allows individuals to own or manage a business, conduct investment activities, or undertake entrepreneurial activities in Australia. It also outlines the basic eligibility requirements for applying.

structured_data.description: This visa allows you to own and manage a business in Australia, conduct business and investment activity in Australia, or undertake an entrepreneurial activity in Australia.

basic_eligibility_requirements: Submit expression of interest (EOI) in SkillSelect
Nominated by a State or Territory government agency or Austrade
Invited to apply for the visa
